name: ts-simple-ast-extra
description: High level TypeScript Compiler API and refactor tools based on ts-morph (ex ts-simple-ast) library

scripts.prettier: npx prettier  --write --arrow-parens avoid --parser typescript --use-tabs false --no-semi true --single-quote true --tab-width 2 --trailing-comma none --end-of-line lf --prose-wrap preserve --print-width 120 --jsx-bracket-same-line true "src/**/*.ts*" "spec/**/*.ts*"
scripts.doc: typedoc --mode modules --ignoreCompilerErrors --out ../docs/ts-simple-ast-extra src/index.ts && npm run docs-readme-toc
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run prettier && npm run build && npm run test && npm run doc
scripts.all-publish: npm run all && npm version patch && npm publish

author: Sebastian Gurin
